column1: Personalized Question Routing via Heterogeneous Network Embedding
AAAI Technical Track: AI and the Web

Question Routing (QR) on Community-based Question Answering (CQA) websites aims at recommending answerers that have high probabilities of providing the “accepted answers” to new questions. The existing question routing algorithms simply predict the ranking of users based on query content. As a consequence
column2: the question raiser information is ignored. On the other hand
column3: they lack learnable scoring functions to explicitly compute ranking scores.
